attributes.action: Walk away from Number 10, follow his dreams & become a teacher by the start of the next school year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned are concerned for the PMs health after suffering "the worst weeks of his political life" and believe the nation should positively respond to his cry for help (he admits he could "walk away from all of this tomorrow". He told the Guardian today that he would like to become a teacher. Support for this petition will encourage the PM to fulfill his dreams.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
